metadata.title: CVE-2022-2989 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An incorrect handling of the supplementary groups in the Podman containerengine might lead to the sensitive information disclosure or possible datamodification if an attacker has direct access to the affected containerwhere supplementary groups are used to set access permissions and is ableto execute a binary code in that container.

criterions.comment: libpod package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
